trans-unit.source: Provides basic functionality for describing the structure of a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: 提供的資料來源的結構描述在設計階段基本功能。

trans-unit.source: Implement the IDataSourceSchema interface to describe a custom data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: 實作 IDataSourceSchema 介面來描述在設計階段的自訂資料來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDocumentSchema>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TypeSchema> classes implement the IDataSourceSchema interface.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDocumentSchema>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TypeSchema>類別實作的介面 IDataSourceSchema。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TypeSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDocumentSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement the IDataSourceSchema are used by custom control designer components to provide lists of fields and views for data-bound controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 自訂控制項的設計工具元件會使用實作 IDataSourceSchema 的類別，為資料繫結控制項提供設計階段欄位與檢視的清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of schema descriptors for views contained in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含在資料來源中檢視結構描述的描述項的陣列。

trans-unit.source: A class that implements the GetViews method returns an array of objects that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema> interface.
trans-unit.target: 類別可實作 GetViews 方法會傳回物件的陣列，實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>

trans-unit.source: For example, in the array returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema.GetViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, each element of the array is a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> object that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema.GetViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName>陣列的每個項目，方法是<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema>實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>物件</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema.GetViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的陣列
